metadata.title: The documentation for the USB driver is not helpful to specify descriptors.

sections.content:
Question:
The documentation for the USB driver is not helpful to specify descriptors.
Answer:
For details on how to specify descriptors, see the sample code on the following pages for reference:
1. CDC class
(1) If you use the RX200 series or RX100 series of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-sample-program-using-usb-peripheral-communication-device-class-driver-pcdc-usb-mini
(2) If you use the RX700 series or RX600 series (other than RX63x or RX62x) of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-sample-program-using-usb-peripheral-communication-device-class-driver-pcdc-communicate-usb
(3) If you use the RX63x or RX62x series of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-usb-peripheral-communication-device-class-driver-pcdc
2. HID class
(1) If you use the RX200 series or RX100 series of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-sample-program-using-usb-peripheral-human-interface-device-class-driver-phid-usb-mini
(2) If you use the RX700 series or RX600 series (other than RX63x or RX62x) of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-sample-program-using-usb-peripheral-human-interface-device-class-driver-phid-communicate
(3) If you use the RX63x or RX62x series of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-usb-peripheral-human-interface-device-class-driver
3. MSC class
(1) If you use the RX200 series or RX100 series of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-sample-program-using-using-usb-peripheral-mass-storage-class-driver-pmsc-usb-mini-firmware
(2) If you use the RX700 series or RX600 series (other than RX63x or RX62x) of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-sample-program-using-using-usb-peripheral-mass-storage-class-driver-pmsc-communicate-usb
(3) If you use the RX63x or RX62x series of an MCU, see the following:
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/scd/rx-family-usb-peripheral-mass-storage-class-driver-pmsc
See the demo_src\r_usb_p<xxx>_descriptor.c files in the ZIP file available on the above pages.
(For example, for the CDC class, see the “demo_src\r_usb_pcdc_descriptor.c” file.)
For details on descriptors, see written USB standards.
Suitable Products
RX
